title: SISAR
author: SISAR
content: BTC integration with ICP is coming very soon! BTC testnet and mainnet are fully synced and added to ICP blockchain as a subnet. Very soon you will be able to DeFi, NFT and much more with your BTC without bridges and other risky tech while your BTC will stay on BTC blockchain. ICP blockchain is pushing hard, with so many github commits lately that it dethroned ETH from top 1 position. At the same time, ICP coin is at all time low price levels. Do not miss this opportunity!
